about_the_game:
Welcome to the "Happy Ending"! A park located on a paradise island where men, orcs, but also woofians like to come to relax... Or at least they used to.

Because yes, recently a mysterious attack of evil horny clones prevent visitors from having a good time... Lead your investigation and find the culprit of all this ruckus!

The content of this DLC:

  • A new plot and new environments !
  • 3 new characters and their ending !
  • A new "multi partner" combat system !
  • 2 new mini games !
  • Many new underwear to sniff...!

Please note that you have to finish the main story from the base game to access DLC content!

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a bara-game. That means it depicts sexual acts between men on many occasions. These scenes are varied and some may also feature drug or alcohol use, as well as BDSM, voyeurism or uro-play.
